DOC.brief_summary: In a prospective, non-interventional, monocentric observational study the pharmacokinetic properties of selected antiinfective drugs during sustained low-efficiency dialysis (SLED) will be analyzed. Plasma specimens will be quantified using high Performance liquid chromatography (HPLC). Primary endpoint: Plasma levels of antiinfectives during SLED Secondary endpoints: - 28-day-mortality - length of stay at the intensive care unit (ICU) and in hospital - clinical and microbiological cure of infections Inclusion criteria: - age: > 18 years - patients under SLED - antiinfective treatment exclusion criteria: - missing informed consent
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Selected Antiinfectives During Sustained Low-efficiency Dialysis (SLED)
DOC.criteria: age: 18 or older patients receiving SLED and either meropenem or ceftazidim missing informed consent
